mapper.sql: id id, name name, url url, parent_id parentId, sort sort, icon icon, model model, method method, create_time createTime
mapper.select: select DISTINCT m.url,m.model,m.name,m.icon,m.parent_id as parentId from sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.id LEFT JOIN sys_role r on r.id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u on ur.user_id = u.id where u.id=#{id}
